div.div:
Hello Pioneers,
Supplemental Learning Packets for those not able to access online materials for grades K-8 will be available at the shed in the Gib Olinger Parking lot starting Wednesday at 10 am. All K-8 packets are also available online on the buildings website just click https://www.miltfree.k12.or.us/extended-learning-4ac0cfe5.
For Mac-Hi students in grades 9th to 11th - if you do not have access to online materials please contact Mac Hi at 541-938-5591 for your packet.
Los paquetes de aprendizaje suplementarios para todos aquellos que no tienen acceso a los materiales en lnea para los grados K-8 estarn disponibles en el cobertizo en el estacionamiento de la escuela primaria Gib Olinger a partir del mircoles a las 10 am. Para los estudiantes de la escuela preparatoria Mac Hi los Grados 9-11 si no tienen acceso a los materiales en lnea, comunquese con la escuela Mac- Hi al 541-938-5591 para obtener su paquete. Todos los paquetes tambin estn disponibles en lnea en el sitio web de cada escuela, simplemente haga clic https://www.miltfree.k12.or.us/extended-learning-4ac0cfe5

img.div:
We hope this message finds you and your family well. Our current situation is requiring us to think outside the box and get creative. This year we will have a variety of options for getting a kindergarten and/or preschool registration packet.
Please visit this page for option details and registration forms: https://drive.google.com//1j7-DqoVgERWQ2c6skkt44YDFoT/view

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout thats similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click read more to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. Youll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
